subject: Can we run junit testSuite generated dynamically
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am writing a little Swing UI which will facilitate user to select test classes and run those tests. I am able to build testsuite but I m not sure how
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am writing a little Swing UI which will facilitate user to select test
classes and run those tests. I am able to build testsuite but I m not sure
how would I run this test suite with Junit thro' the program eg on a button
action performed. I 'd appreciate if somebody can tell me how to run the
testsuite from within a program. Junit, as it uses reflection and reloads
the class, cant run the suite which was generated dynamically.

Shailesh


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
